subject: Le Mans Auto Race
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Nico Hülkenberg became the first active Formula One driver in 24 years to win the world's most famous endurance race, the 24 Hours of Le Mans, last weekend in France.
snippet: Nico Hülkenberg became the first active Formula One driver in 24 years to win the world's most famous endurance race, the 24 Hours of Le Mans, last weekend in France.
